feed.title: Dockcheck Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.4.1
entry.content:
New

  • Added Matrix-Synapse notification Template by @silverbios in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/69

Fixes

  • removed unused var
  • cleaned up some prints
  • re-written array sorting
  • re-formatted compose and env file checks
    • clearing bug for multi-env-container which would break.
    • accounted for rare compose-path formatting which would break.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.0...v0.4.1

New Contributors

  • @silverbios made their first contribution in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/69

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.4.3
entry.content:
New

  • Added a timeout (10s) to the registry check, to skip a container if it takes too long instead of hanging/breaking.
    • Additionally added the option -t to set a custom timeout if preferred.

Fixes

  • Update HTTP method in notify_matrix.sh by @silverbios in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/76

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.1...v0.4.3

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.4.4
entry.content:
Fixes:

  • Bugfix with the new timeout function, which would break on non amd64/arm64.

Great catch and solution by @yoyoma2

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.3...v0.4.4

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.4.5
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Added a check for timeout binary, skipping timeouts if not available (core-utils).
  • Reverted to old syntax of array sorting for compatibility with older bash versions.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.4...v0.4.5

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.4.6
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Compatibility fixes to timeout function (no --foreground flag if busybox). thanks to @cerealconyogurt who reported and tested.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.5...v0.4.6
